scripts.build: babel src --out-dir public --source-maps inline --copy-files && babel doc/API/build --out-dir public/views/dev-center --source-maps inline --copy-files && npm run hashJS
scripts.hashJS: javascript-obfuscator public/views/js/index.js --output public/views/js/index.js --compact true --selfDefending false --deadCodeInjection true --disableConsoleOutput true --mangle true --seed 666 && javascript-obfuscator public/views/js/intro.js --output public/views/js/intro.js --compact true --selfDefending false --deadCodeInjection true --disableConsoleOutput true --mangle true --seed 666 && javascript-obfuscator public/views/js/forgot-pass.js --output public/views/js/forgot-pass.js --compact true --selfDefending false --deadCodeInjection true --disableConsoleOutput true --mangle true --seed 666 && javascript-obfuscator public/views/js/profile.js --output public/views/js/profile.js --compact true --selfDefending false --deadCodeInjection true --disableConsoleOutput true --mangle true --seed 666 && javascript-obfuscator public/views/js/redirect.js --output public/views/js/redirect.js --compact true --selfDefending false --deadCodeInjection true --disableConsoleOutput true --mangle true --seed 666 && javascript-obfuscator public/views/js/register.js --output public/views/js/register.js --compact true --selfDefending false --deadCodeInjection true --disableConsoleOutput true --mangle true --seed 666
